description.lang: The multiple sound siren PSE02 is a wireless siren, based on Z-Wave technology.It is theZ-Wave plus product, it support the security, OTA... Those newest features of the Z-Wave technology.Z-Wave is a wireless communication protocol designed for home automation, specifically to remotely control applications in residential and light commercial environments. The technology uses a low-power RF radio embedded or retrofitted into home electronics devices and systems, such as lighting, home access control, entertainment systems and household appliances.
Disable the alarm function.1: Disable Alarm, 0: Enable Alarm.Caution: After the power up, this configuration always be 0.
Play alarm sound duration, 1 tick is 30 seconds. Default is 3 minutes, maximum is 63.5 minutes 0: means never auto stop.
Play alarm sound duration, 1 tick is 30seconds
Customer function switch, using bit control.
Notification Type, 0: Using Notification Report. 1: Using Sensor Binary Report.
